title: Release a Stuck User License
description: A user's license is 'stuck' to a machine that is no longer available, and they need it released so they can activate it on a new machine.

tasks.description: Identify the user's account and the license key in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the license and sees it is currently activated.

tasks.description: Use the license management tool to remotely deactivate the license, releasing it from the old machine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully frees up the license.

tasks.description: Inform the user the license has been released and they can now activate it on their new machine.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user is able to successfully activate the software.
